title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions: Indulge in luxurious comfort with our Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack! This full coverage, wirefree bra is perfect for plus-size beauties, available in sizes from 32C to 50DD. The adjustable front straps ensure a perfect fit every time. Made from a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this pack includes a satin bra in a fierce leopard print, as well as other classic colors like white and nude. Say goodbye to discomfort with the wide band and rows of hook-and-eye closures for maximum support. Elevate your lingerie collection with our stylish and functional bra pack today!
